title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020)), after consulting with the Garda
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Retirement)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Garda Síochána (Retirement) 

Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited garda siochana (retirement) regulation 2024

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020)), after consulting with the Garda
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 3 September 2024.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 3 September 2024.

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 452 of 2020)), after consulting with the Garda
heading: 3. Subject to section 4 of the Public Service Superannuation (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
3. Subject to section 4 of the Public Service Superannuation (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2004 (No. 7 of 2004), and notwithstanding anything contained 
in – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the Garda Síochána (Retirement) Regulations 1934 (S.R & O., 
No. 146 of 1934), 

the Garda Síochána (Retirement) (No. 2) Regulations 1951 (S.I. 
No. 335 of 1951), or 

the Garda Síochána (Retirement) Regulations 1996 (S.I. No. 16 
of 1996), 

a member of the Garda Síochána who was appointed as a new entrant to the 
Garda Síochána on or after 1 April 2004 and who holds a rank below the rank of 
Garda Commissioner shall retire on attaining the age of 62 years. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Government hereby approve of the foregoing Regulations. 

[437] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

3 September, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 September, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [437]
